page.title: 12RECREATION Essex/CambsBorder
page.content: Adults participate in various local activities _ Parish Council, Church and Chapel Councils, Village Hall Committees, Over 60's, Womens Institute, Cricket and Tennis Clubs. Public footpaths are used - 2 paths frequently. Outsiders walk the Icknield Way often. Home activities include television, videos, sewing, reading, letter writing, home improve- ments, gardening _ predominantly large gardens. One unusual hobby is taxidermy _ assisted by living in the country. Regular pheasant shoots are held. Also vermin are shot. Few people visit the local public house in Chrishall village.
